opinion:
ADMINISTRATIVE DOCKET, 62 Ohio St.3d 1488 (1991) 582 N.E.2d 612, 613Supreme Court of Ohio. 1991.
ADMINISTRATIVE DOCKET Tuesday, December 24, 1991 1. Amendments to Gov. Bar R. I, Sections 1, 2, 3, 6 and 8, and Gov. Bar R. XX, Section 2, were adopted, effective May 1, 1992, and August 1, 1992.Page 1489
